settings.title: Free Shipping (Homepage)
settings.text:
Offering free shipping is a powerful incentive, especially if customers
are close to meeting a certain order value threshold to qualify for it.

settings.title: Countdown (Collection Page)
settings.text:
Time-limited discounts, flash sales, or countdown timers can create a
sense of urgency, prompting customers to make quicker purchasing
decisions.

settings.title: Collection Page Embed
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Low Inventory (Product Page)
settings.text: A low inventory banner creates a sense of urgency and scarcity among customers. When they see that a product is running out, they are more likely to make a purchase immediately instead of delaying their decision. This can help drive conversions and increase sales.

settings.title: Buy One, Get One Embed
settings.text: Strategy offers a free product when a customer purchases one, which can motivate them to buy more.

settings.title: Reward First Time Shoppers
settings.text:
Offering a special discount for first-time shoppers can encourage them
to make their first purchase and experience your products.

settings.title: Social Media and Email Promotions
settings.text: Offer exclusive discounts to customers who follow you on social media or subscribe to your email list. This can help grow your online presence and engagement.

settings.title: Announcement Bars
settings.text: Make your promotions stand out and capture your customers' attention with Announcement Bar - the perfect way to get your sales, specials and promos seen! You can use it as a top bar, bottom bar, or sticky bar.

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Free Shipping Bar
settings.text: Enhance user experience by prominently featuring the dynamic Free Shipping offer in an easily noticeable announcement bar positioned at the top of every page. For example, the cart page, serving as a convenient reminder for customers how much to spend to qualify for free shipping before checking out.

settings.title: Homepage (Only) Announcement Bar
settings.text: Make your promotions stand out and capture your customers' attention with Announcement Bar - the perfect way to get your sales, specials and promos seen! You can use it as a top bar, bottom bar, or sticky bar.

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
